name: EquipRent
description: EquipRent is a peer to peer web application providing users a platform to rent/borrow equipment from other users (outdoors, camping, etc.).

name: Social Celeb
description: Social Celeb data analytics web applciation providing information on likes and number of followers of social media influencers.

name: Tasteful
description: Tasteful is a food search app that matches descriptive keywords of the user's desired food craving resulting in a refined and precise search experience.
